item.name: Home
item.description: My hair stylist used to tell the colorists tasked with giving me platinum highlights, “don’t be fooled. She’s a lawyer on the outside, but she’s got 8 tattoos underneath all that.” I got my first tattoo over a decade ago. I told my mom I needed some office decor and asked her to write our […]
